name: Villain Academy - Ordo Tenebris
description:
Demo features:

- One fully complete route (out of 6 normal and 1 hidden)

- Your choices matter! 

- Fast-paced and no fillers.

- Mc is canonically female, but looks androgenous. Gender is irrelevant apart from 1 optional choice.

- Classical music composed by moi

- Cool backgrounds and portraits

- Hugs, kisses and "borrowed" hoodies (important for the mission, ofc)

- Steal a holy sword from the Elysial realm and frame somebody

- Break free from mind control, or succumb to it.

- Kill a hero with the power of love demon magic, it counts as an extra credit project :p

- (May get murdered for being speciecist or in the wrong place)

- Have your happily evil after, but only if you earn it ;)

Full game features (hopefully):

-Full body illustrations with facial expressions

- Romance a  genius half-demon with mommy issues who would die for you, yandere dark elf who is a wolf in sheep's clothing and commands plants, sadist human wizard with a huge fanclub, dopamine-addicted vampire with a bunch of kids, innocent beastkin who always gets bullied, undercover instructor (or the great Azazel himself in the hidden route)

- sound effects and music that matches the mood

- personality stats that affect the ending

- school subjects and midterms

-  perfect mix of cuteness and evil ^^
